item.title: 议长约翰逊称已对鲍威尔 "失去兴趣
item.description: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）表示，他对杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）"不满意"，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统因对高利率的不满而攻击美联储主席。【原文：House Speaker Mike Johnson said he is “disenchanted” with Jerome Powell, as President Donald Trump attacks the Federal Reserve chairman over frustrations with high interest rates.】

item.title: 白宫发布促进发展的全面人工智能行动计划
item.description: 特朗普政府呼吁通过放松监管和扩大数据中心的能源供应来促进美国的人工智能发展，新的指导方针还敦促联邦政府扣留那些被认定对新兴技术有繁琐监管的州的资金。【原文：The Trump administration called for boosting artificial intelligence development in the US by loosening regulations and expanding energy supply for data centers under new guidelines that also urged the federal government to withhold funding from states determined to have burdensome regulations on the emerging technology.】

item.title: Invesco 的 QQQ 赌局有望带来 1.5 亿美元收入
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 将其著名的科技基金 QQQ 转换为开放式结构的举措，可能会为该资产管理公司带来每年 1.5 亿美元的意外之财。【原文：Invesco Ltd.’s move to convert its famed tech fund QQQ into an open-ended structure could translate into a $150 million yearly windfall for the asset manager.】

item.title: 约翰逊开始制定后续税收法案，寻求秋季通过
item.description: 众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnsons）周三在接受彭博政府采访时表示，众议院共和党人正在着手制定最近颁布的税收与支出法的后续法案，旨在通过从唐纳德-特朗普总统的 "一个庞大而漂亮的法案 "中删除的条款。【原文：House Republicans are starting work on a follow-up to their recently enacted tax-and-spending law, aiming to pass provisions that were removed from President Donald Trump’s “one big, beautiful bill,” Speaker Mike Johnsonsaid in an interview Wednesday with Bloomberg Government.】

item.title: 尼日利亚在六个月内征收的 2025 年税收超过目标的一半
item.description: 尽管油价跌至预算预期以下，但尼日利亚今年前六个月的税收仍超过了年度目标的一半。【原文：Nigeria collected more than half its targeted annual tax revenue in the first six months of the year, despite the oil price dropping below budget projections.】

item.title: 特朗普与日本达成协议，美国股市再创新高
item.description: 周三，随着唐纳德-特朗普总统与日本达成贸易协议，以及投资者为今天晚些时候的首轮大型科技财报做好准备，美国股市继续创纪录地反弹。【原文：The record-breaking rally in US equities continued on Wednesday as President Donald Trump reached a trade deal with Japan and investors geared up for the first round of big tech earnings later today.】

item.title: 肯尼亚在 2027 年投票前收入增长受限

item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）表示，"不急于 "确定美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的继任者，提名人选有可能来自现任董事会成员或地区银行的负责人。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said that there’s “no rush” to identify a successor to Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, and that a nominee could potentially come from current board members or the heads of the district banks.】

item.title: 印度将批准新季白糖出口的信号导致白糖下跌
item.description: 白糖期货跌至三周低点，因为市场预期全球第二大白糖种植国印度将允许在下一季装运白糖，从而提振全球供应前景。【原文：Sugar futures fell to a three-week low amid expectations that India, the world’s second-largest grower, will allow shipments in the forthcoming season in a boost to global supply prospects.】

item.title: Sonos 任命汤姆-康拉德（Tom Conrad）为永久首席执行官，谋求扭亏为盈
item.description: Sonos Inc.任命临时领导人汤姆-康拉德（Tom Conrad）为下一任首席执行官，表达了对他为这个陷入困境的音响品牌所做的扭亏为盈努力的信心。【原文：Sonos Inc. named interim leader Tom Conrad as its next chief executive officer, expressing confidence in the turnaround effort he’s pursuing at the embattled audio brand.】

item.title: 苹果公司推出每月 20 美元的 AppleCare One 计划，最多可覆盖三台设备

item.title: Vanta 新一轮融资估值达 41.5 亿美元

item.title: 布鲁克菲尔德（Brookfield）错过了其首席执行官预见到的私募股权投资热潮

item.title: 罗杰斯收购多伦多体育队后上调收入预期
